answerText: reduction[10] Many reducing agents serve as donors of this chemical group. Four of this group are bonded to aluminum in one such agent, and DIBAL serves as a selective donor of them to acyl chloride groups.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 15 | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Diborane is often used to affect this kind of transformation, though it doesn't work that well on ketones. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this kind of chemical reaction in which the reactant gains electrons, which is contrasted with an oxidation reaction.
